snippet: Kemba Walker averaged 26 points a game in Connecticut's run through the Big East tournament en route to the Huskies' winning the national championship.
abstract: Kemba Walker averaged 26 points a game in Connecticut's run through the Big East tournament en route to the Huskies' winning the national championship.

headline.main: Walker Returns to Garden, Site of Big East Glory
headline.print_headline: Walker Returns to Site of Big East Glory
